title: Bears, and bears, and bears oh my
text: Why are there so many bears out here? For the love of all things holy, please reduce the bear population

title: On Lemons: A memoir by Cave Johnson
text: Alright, I've been thinking. When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons; what am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down... with the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!

title: I always come back
text: And no, "William Afton" is not an alias for "Norville 'Shaggy' Rogers"! Stop asking!
